Uses of Interface
org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation.IsDefaultsBorderOptionsHandler

  • Packages that use IsDefaultsBorderOptionsHandler 
    Package Description
    org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation
    Contains all classes to activate the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin (AKA chartjs-plugin-annotation.js ) for CHART.js.

    • Uses of IsDefaultsBorderOptionsHandler in org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation

      Subinterfaces of IsDefaultsBorderOptionsHandler in org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      (package private) interface  HasBorderOptions
      Interface to map the border options options.
      (package private) interface  IsDefaultsAbstractCircleBasedAnnotation
      This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin annotation DEFAULTS options interface for annotation which are configured by a point and radius in a chart.
      (package private) interface  IsDefaultsAbstractPointedAnnotation
      This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin annotation DEFAULTS options interface for annotation which are configured by a point in a chart.
      (package private) interface  IsDefaultsAnnotation
      This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin annotation DEFAULTS options.
      (package private) interface  IsDefaultsArrow
      This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin annotation ARROW HEADS options.
      (package private) interface  IsDefaultsArrowHeads
      This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin annotation ARROW HEADS options.
      (package private) interface  IsDefaultsBoxAnnotation
      This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin BOX annotation DEFAULTS options.
      (package private) interface  IsDefaultsCallout
      This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin CALLOUT of LABEL annotation DEFAULTS options.
      (package private) interface  IsDefaultsEllipseAnnotation
      This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin ELLIPSE annotation DEFAULTS options.

      This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin LABEL annotation DEFAULTS options.

      This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin POINT annotation DEFAULTS options interface.
      Classes in org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation that implement IsDefaultsBorderOptionsHandler 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AbstractAnnotation
      Base class to define an annotation in the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin.
      It contains all commons properties to define an annotation.
      (package private) class  AbstractCircleBasedAnnotation
      This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin annotation DEFAULTS options for annotation which are configured by a point and with a radius in a chart.
      (package private) class  AbstractPointedAnnotation
      This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin annotation DEFAULTS options for annotation which are configured by a point in a chart.
      class  Arrow
      Implements a ARROWHEADS, and its start and end nodes, to apply on a LINE annotation.
      class  ArrowHeads
      Implements a ARROWHEADS to apply on a LINE annotation.
      class  BoxAnnotation
      Implements a BOX annotation which draws a box in the a chart.
      If one of the axes is not specified, the box will take the entire chart dimension.
      The 4 coordinates, xMin, xMax, yMin, yMax are optional.
      class  Callout
      Implements a CALLOUT to apply on a LABEL annotation.
      (package private) class  DefaultArrow
      This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin LINE annotation ARROWHEADS options.
      (package private) class  DefaultArrowHeads
      This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin LINE annotation ARROWHEADS options.
      (package private) class  DefaultBox
      This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin BOX annotation DEFAULTS options.
      (package private) class  DefaultCallout
      This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin CALLOUT of LABEL annotation DEFAULTS options.
      (package private) class  DefaultEllipse
      This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin ELLIPSE annotation DEFAULTS options.
      (package private) class  DefaultLabel
      This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin LABEL annotation DEFAULTS options.
      (package private) class  DefaultLine
      This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin LINE annotation DEFAULTS options.
      (package private) class  DefaultLineLabel
      This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin LABEL of LINE annotation DEFAULTS options.
      (package private) class  DefaultPoint
      This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin POINT annotation DEFAULTS options.
      (package private) class  DefaultPolygon
      This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin POLYGON annotation DEFAULTS options.
      class  EllipseAnnotation
      Implements a ELLIPSE annotation which draws a ellipse in the a chart.
      If one of the axes is not specified, the ellipse will take the entire chart dimension.
      The 4 coordinates, xMin, xMax, yMin, yMax are optional.
      class  LabelAnnotation
      Implements a LABEL annotation which draws a content in the a chart.
      class  LineAnnotation
      Implements a LINE annotation which draws a line in the a chart.
      class  LineLabel
      Implements a LABEL to apply on a LINE annotation.
      class  PointAnnotation
      Implements a POINT annotation which draws a point in the a chart.
      class  PolygonAnnotation
      Implements a POLYGON annotation which draws a polygon in the a chart.
      Constructors in org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation with parameters of type IsDefaultsBorderOptionsHandler 
      Constructor Description
      BorderOptionsHandler​(AbstractAnnotation parent, IsDefaultsBorderOptionsHandler defaultValues, NativeObject nativeObject)
      Creates a border options handler with the native object where border options properties must be managed and the default value to use when the property does not exist.
